original_title: 実録! ! ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 18
overview: The 18th installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time as well, in "2 AM Tunnel", four young men and women visit a haunted spot as a double date and film the scene. psychic phenomena are recorded.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 18
